h1: How Many Calories in a Cheese Quesadilla?
assumptions: 8-inch flour tortilla with 2 oz shredded cheddar cheese, folded and pan-cooked without added oil or butter.

quick_answer.text: A standard cheese quesadilla has about 450 kcal, with 18 g protein and 25 g fat.

faqs.q: How many calories is in a cheese quesadilla?
faqs.a: Approximately 450 kcal for a standard 8-inch version with cheddar cheese.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a cheese quesadilla?
faqs.a: About 40 g carbs, 18 g protein, 25 g fat, including 12 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Is a cheese quesadilla high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 800 mg due to cheese and tortilla; opt for low-sodium versions to reduce.

faqs.q: How does cheese type affect calories?

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie cheese quesadilla?
faqs.a: Yes, use a smaller tortilla, low-fat cheese, or bake instead of pan-frying to cut ~100 kcal.
